titleStmt.title: A just account of the horrid contrivance of John Cupper, and Judith Brown, his servant, in poysoning his wife who were tryed at the assizes held at Shrewsbury, the 21st. day of July, 1684 : Cupper to be hang'd in chains, and Judith Brown to be burnt : together with their dying confessions / published by me William Smith, Rector of Bitterly, their minister, to prevent false reports.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, Rector of Bitterley.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Robinson, Bookseller in Ludlow,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
